Question: There was no shade for Jenny.  She was forced to lie there exposed to what?
Options: A. full sunlight B. bright sunshine C. sunny place D. eat cake E. direct sunlight

The answer is E. Direct sunlight, because there was no shade for Jenny, she was forced to lie there exposed to direct sunlight. She could not get shade because it was hot and sunny outside. Full sunlight and bright sunshine are not the same as direct sunlight. She was not forced to lie in a sunny place because it was a shady area. She was not forced to eat cake because of the situation.
